title: How it feels to watch a tutorial on how to succeed at league

replies.body:
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2FpEcpGqn.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

Relevant

{{champion:111}} 
Damn the second point. Can't go though it.
DAMN, I hope that dive suit is flame retardant.
What a work of art.
"Just don't feed and farm cs"
That's actually extremely good advice.
Sometimes it ins't your choice though is what I think they're saying, like when you get dived repeatedly under tower and can't farm in lane safely anymore.

You did something to get to the point that the enemy laner can dive you, though.

I see this all the time. Ekko dies to darius 4 times top lane. Dies a 5th time and says, "omg can't do anything Darius tower dives me."

Well yeah, you fed the shit out of him...what do you expect at this point?
Some champs are very good at diving, ya gotta give the enemy some credit.
You should never die 1v1 in lane. If you do, it's you, not the enemy. I mean, unless you're playing against some high elo smurf.
I didn't mean a 1v1, I meant the laner(s) and jungler diving you, not just the laner. I agree 100% dying to your laner is your own fault.
Yeah, that is excusable. Though I will say that proper warding really limits dives. The only time I really die in lane is if I'm playing ADC and my support is a hurr durr.

as a jungler I can say without a doubt on top that you don't have enough wards to keep all the entrances covered.  not disagreein with your whole point, just that bit. you can't ward a jungler out easily, the only thing you can do is ward the river and hope you get lucky
I typically have a ward in the River and a pink ward by the blue entrance :)
you've left lane wide open, no worries, everyone seems to forget that one. nothing better than a jumpscare 3 man though.

I wonder how many layers a chat box can get to, reply so we can figure out.
Also i like to jungle, I play morde, with a good leash i dont even need pots so i literally just buy 2 pinks, one for each buff and i take TP, for if the pink or buff is getting destroyed. Not exactly in the conversation but i needed an excuse to see the smallest chat box on the boards

it caps at 14. if you want an example of it getting reached, look for me and laughing fish having our talk about garen here.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/VYBak9EE-i-think-using-any-of-the-following-champion-should-automatically-result-in-a-permaban

when I reply to myself, that is the cap.
lol
I hit it twice in that conversation. and once during this.

So this is the max? Cool
(p.s. i downvoted myself so this one would appear after the other one)
Well i still wanna check
Lol u dont even need a leash lol Morde self heals like 1/4th hp lol
RIP the lee sin and any top laner with cc like Darius. They will tower dive you level 3. Or in my case, I will tower dive you lvl 3 with lee.
Unless its Zed...
The ever-helpful Monster Hunter advice of "Don't get hit, hit it until it dies" is just as helpful.
I was hoping it would be "git gud", I am somewhat disappointed.
Beautiful.
this feels like a home made gif

Step 1.) Play with friends

Step 2.) Play with friends

Step 3.) Play with friends

Step 4.) Play with friends

Step 5.) Play with friends and play meta champions

Congrats, now you are Dimand
-RiotGames
All hail the Lord Fish.

O Great and Powerful Lord Fish, please, show us your memeing ways!

That is the best art I've ever seen.
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/epicrapbattlesofhistory/images/1/15/Pikachu_is_amazed.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150223023559

"If we make the first move we get the first move.''
-Sickmotion 2016
"As long as you win more games than you lose, you're gonna climb" A diamond player's advice.
Not if you only have a 55% win ratio. the Ip gain to loss ratio makes it so you need atleast a 60% or higher win ration in order to climb.
Well that can happen if you learn to Multibox xD

Step 1.) Spam Yi

Step 2.) ????

Step 3.) Challenger

[reddit.com/r/koreanadvice](http://reddit.com/r/koreanadvice)

Just win.
Yes, because the differences between wins and losses in low elo are so huge but so simple.
